# logos <img src="man/figures/logo.png" align="right" height="275" alt="" />

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of `logos` is to give access to the Greek New Testament (27 books) and the Tanach (39 books) and allow users to do textual analysis on the textual data. The New and Old Testament have been provided in their original languages, Greek and Hebrew, respectively. 

## Installation

You can install the development version of logos like so:

``` r
devtools::install_github("jpmonteagudo28/logos")
```

or download the package from CRAN like so:
```r
install.packages("logos")
```
